Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.school

Class School

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.school.School
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class School extends Object implements Serializable
Represents School's board Composed by entry, student's hall, professor's hall and tower zone

    • winProf

      Parameters:
      players - of the match
      playerTurn - player that is playing
      cardEffectPlayed - card effect played in the turn

    • getProfInHall

      public boolean getProfInHall(SColor color)
      Verifies if the player wins a Professor or not
      Parameters:
      color - of the Professor
      Returns:
      true if there is the prof of color "color" in the school, otherwise return false
